message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a decent amount.  We can work out a better deal later if you want.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money, literally!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  But this is my final offer.  Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Meet me halfway or this deal is off.  Tick-tock!
